vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
φῶς,
contraction for φάος, light (which see). φῴς, ἡ, plural φῷδες, contraction from φωΐς (which see).
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
light; daylight; firelight
light, Mt. 17:2; 2Cor. 4:6; daylight, broad day, Mt. 10:27; Lk. 12:3; radiance, blaze of light, Mt. 4:16; Acts 9:3; 12:7; an instrument or means of light, a light, Mt. 6:23; Acts 16:29; a fire, Mk. 14:54; Lk. 22:56; from the Hebrew, the light of God's presence, 2Cor. 11:14; 1Tim. 6:16; metaphorically the light of Divine truth, spiritual illumination, Lk. 16:8; Jn. 3:19; Rom. 13:12; Eph. 5:8; 1Pet. 2:9; 1Jn. 1:7; 2:8, 9, 10; a source or dispenser of spiritual light, Mt. 5:14; Jn. 1:4, 5, 7, 8, 9; 8:12; 9:5; pure radiance, perfect brightness, 1Jn. 1:5
vocabInfos._es_Definition: luz (a menudo con connotaciones teológicas) ; fuego (MAR.14:54; LUK.22:56) ; abiertamente, públicamente (MAT.10:27; LUC.12:3)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 光
1a) 物質界的
1b) 超自然界的
1b1) 屬神的範疇與元素
1b2) 人類心靈的啟蒙
1b3) 有此光照的人, 或帶來這種光照的人
1b4) 被屬天的光照亮或充滿的人
2) 燈, 火把, 燈籠
7
